column4: Greetings, everyone. I have a question. Is it preferred to install GNOME Shell through APT or should I just install the Gnome Shell Remix version of 12.04?
I want to be able to use GNOME Shell with 12.04, but I heard it was buggy if you just installed it on top of a Unity install.
that might be a holdover from my /home being used on other distros.
